inspection_services.description: Fire protection inspection and testing - NFPA compliance

items.name: Sprinkler Inspection - Annual (Small)
items.description: Annual sprinkler inspection, under 50 heads, NFPA 25

items.name: Sprinkler Inspection - Annual (Medium)
items.description: Annual sprinkler inspection, 50-200 heads, NFPA 25

items.name: Sprinkler Inspection - Annual (Large)
items.description: Annual sprinkler inspection, 200+ heads, NFPA 25

items.name: Sprinkler Inspection - Quarterly
items.description: Quarterly sprinkler inspection, visual and gauges, NFPA 25

items.name: Fire Pump Test - Annual
items.description: Annual fire pump flow test, churn/no-flow, NFPA 25

items.name: Standpipe Flow Test
items.description: 5-year standpipe flow test, NFPA 25

items.name: Fire Alarm Inspection - Annual (Small)
items.description: Annual fire alarm inspection, under 25 devices, NFPA 72

items.name: Fire Alarm Inspection - Annual (Medium)
items.description: Annual fire alarm inspection, 25-100 devices, NFPA 72

items.name: Fire Alarm Inspection - Annual (Large)
items.description: Annual fire alarm inspection, 100+ devices, NFPA 72

items.name: Fire Extinguisher Inspection - Annual
items.description: Annual fire extinguisher inspection per unit, NFPA 10

items.name: Fire Extinguisher 6-Year Service
items.description: 6-year fire extinguisher maintenance per unit, NFPA 10

items.name: Fire Extinguisher Hydro Test (12-Year)
items.description: 12-year hydrostatic test per unit, NFPA 10

items.name: Fire Extinguisher Recharge - ABC
items.description: ABC extinguisher recharge per lb, after use or 6-year

items.name: Kitchen Hood Inspection - Semi-Annual
items.description: Semi-annual kitchen hood suppression inspection, NFPA 96/17A

items.name: Kitchen Hood 6-Year Service
items.description: 6-year kitchen hood suppression service with agent, NFPA 17A

items.name: Fire Alarm Monitoring - Monthly
items.description: 24/7 fire alarm monitoring, UL listed central station

items.name: Sprinkler Monitoring - Monthly
items.description: Sprinkler waterflow/tamper monitoring, additional supervision

notes: Monitoring services create recurring monthly revenue (RMR)
Fire extinguisher service has 3 revenue cycles: annual, 6-year, 12-year
Kitchen hood inspection is semi-annual (2x/year revenue)
